question: Breathing: Breathe for the  _______  Follow these steps for mouth-to-mouth breathing for a  _______ .
As soon as an AED is available, apply it and follow the  _______ .
Push straight down on (compress) the chest at least 2 inches (5  _______ ) but no more than 2.4 inches (6  _______ ).
After opening the airway (using the  _______ -tilt, chin-lift maneuver), pinch the nostrils shut for mouth-to-mouth breathing and cover the person's mouth with yours, making a seal.
The above advice applies to situations in which  _______ , children and infants need CPR, but not newborns (infants up to 4 weeks old).
